replace.description: An object with `"key": "value"` pairs that determine which loot table (`"key"`) will be replaced with a new loot table (`"value"`).
replace.markdownDescription: An object with `"key": "value"` pairs that determine which loot table (`"key"`) will be replaced with a new loot table (`"value"`).

bientity_condition.description: If specified, the loot tables will only be replaced if this condition is fulfilled by either or both '*_actor_*' and '*_target_*' entities.
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the loot tables will only be replaced if this condition is fulfilled by either or both '*_actor_*' and '*_target_*' entities.

block_condition.description: If specified, the loot tables will only be replaced if the block at the context of the loot tables fulfill this condition.
block_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the loot tables will only be replaced if the block at the context of the loot tables fulfill this condition.

item_condition.description: If specified, the loot tables will only be replaced if the item in the context of the loot tables fulfill this condition.
item_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the loot tables will only be replaced if the item in the context of the loot tables fulfill this condition.

priority.description: Determines the application priority of the power.
priority.markdownDescription: Determines the application priority of the power.
